Paresh SHAH and Shobhana Shah, Appellants-Defendants-Counterclaim Plaintiffs,
v.
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A., Appellee-Plaintiff-Counterclaim Defendant. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-MF-629 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED September 25, 2018

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
